original_title: Middle of the Road: Video Collection 1971-2003
overview: Middle of the Road is a Scottish pop group who have enjoyed success across Europe and Latin America since the 1970s. This is a collection of their greatest hits, including: "Chirpy Chirpy Cheep Cheep", "Tweedle Dee, Tweedle Dum", "Soley, Soley", "Sacramento", "Samson and Delilah", and many others.
title: Middle of the Road: Video Collection 1971-2003
